content.text:
# 1976 Country Music Association Awards

The 1976 Country Music Association Awards, 10th Ceremony, was held on October 11, 1976, at the Grand Ole Opry House, Nashville, Tennessee, and was hosted by CMA Award winners Johnny Cash and Roy Clark.
Winners and nominees
Winners in Bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year
|-
| valign="top" |

** Waylon Jennings
** Ronnie Milsap
** Willie Nelson
** Dolly Parton
| valign="top" |
* 'Wanted! The Outlaws — Waylon Jennings, Willie Nelson, Jessi Colter, Tompall Glaser'

** Night Things — Ronnie Milsap
** Teddy Bear — Red Sovine
** The Blind Man in the Bleachers — Kenny Starr
